revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=TL-WPA4220 |revision=v4 |price=50 |series=AV500 |fcc_date=07/12/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=TE7WPA4220V4, TE7TLWPA4220V3 |ic_id=8853A-WPA4220 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.15 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628N;MT7628NN, 1710-AJCSL, EAP0W380; |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model=AR7420;AR7420-AL3C, NK713D0K, 1713, TAIWAN; |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3R56E40ABF-8E |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628N;MT7628NN, 1710-AJCSL, EAP0W380; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=HomePlug AFE/Line Driver;Atheros;AR1540;Atheros, AR1540-, AL3C M,ABAH KR;1; |flags=HomePlug AV 500 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=TP-Link_XXXX |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|300Mbps Wi-Fi Range Extender,AV600 Powerline Edition}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/TL-WPA4220.html}} {{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=TL-WPA4220_V4}}
* Web GUI: http://tplinkplc.net
TE7WPA4220V4 is a FCC change in identification request from TE7TLWPA4220V3. The two are electrically identical so most details here are copied from the [[TP-LINK TL-WPA4220]]
FCC documents and some datasheets online refer to this product as AV600 but the website says AV500. Most other AR7420 devices claim to be AV500. If this device has been upgraded to use the AR7450 then it might support HomePlug AV2 600 but FCC docs show the AR7420.
